text: John Block may refer to: *John Block (South African politician) (born 1968), South African politician *John Nicolaas Block (1929–1994), Dutch aviation pioneer *John Rusling Block (born 1935), United States Secretary of Agriculture *John Block (basketball), (born 1944), NBA basketball player *John Block (filmmaker), American filmmaker *Jack Block (1924–2010), American psychology professor
title: John Block
